about_the_game:
Cell Sword is a six-degree-of-freedom (6DoF) sci-fi adventure set inside the human body inspired by classic shooters of the 1990s. The full game is an epic single player campaign and story that takes place over 16 levels.

Thank you for your interest in our "Cell Sword" medical affiliate program. Here at Mediweapon we value your contributions and we are certainly not a giant evil corporation. After you sign up, we inject a microscopic ship into a patient and rely on you to pilot it around and destroy any virus or disease. It's a great way to save some lives, earn some credits and help build a better future on the ruins of the world we absolutely did not help destroy.

It is the future. Video games are dead. 

War has left the world polluted with microscopic autonomous robots. These drones enter the bloodstream and consume the organs and life-force of their host.

This deadly disease is known as RUST.

Instead of games, players are hired by the rich to remotely pilot fast nanobot crafts to blast the Rust. These guns-for-hire are called Cell Swords.

Cell Sword is under heavy development but you can experience an exclusive sneak peak with our Next Fest demo.

This demo contains the training level, the first level of the game, and an epic brand new level created exclusively for Next Fest.

"It's Descent but inside the human body!" -- Developer

"It's hilarious and dark but also a solid shooter." -- Also the developer

"Have you seen the film Fantastic Voyage? Or Inner Space? No? Yeah, well, I love those too." -- Still the developer

We do original research into the history of games to make interesting projects. Cell Sword is our love letter to the #6DoF subgenre.

Please note: Screenshots and trailer footage are taken from the development version and the final product will look different.

Trailer music is "Spider Pants (with Grace)" by WangleLine.

content_descriptors.notes:
Cell Sword takes place inside the microscopic world of the human body. There are references (both textual and visual) to anatomy, blood and medical procedures (including pregnancy) but presented in a fantastical and non-realistic setting.

For example a blood cell may be the size of a building.

Cell Sword is a six-degree-of-freedom (6DoF) sci-fi adventure set inside the human body inspired by classic shooters of the 1990s. The full game is an epic single player campaign and story that takes place over 16 levels.

Thank you for your interest in our "Cell Sword" medical affiliate program. Here at Mediweapon we value your contributions and we are certainly not a giant evil corporation. After you sign up, we inject a microscopic ship into a patient and rely on you to pilot it around and destroy any virus or disease. It's a great way to save some lives, earn some credits and help build a better future on the ruins of the world we absolutely did not help destroy.

It is the future. Video games are dead. 

War has left the world polluted with microscopic autonomous robots. These drones enter the bloodstream and consume the organs and life-force of their host.

This deadly disease is known as RUST.

Instead of games, players are hired by the rich to remotely pilot fast nanobot crafts to blast the Rust. These guns-for-hire are called Cell Swords.

Cell Sword is under heavy development but you can experience an exclusive sneak peak with our Next Fest demo.

This demo contains the training level, the first level of the game, and an epic brand new level created exclusively for Next Fest.

"It's hilarious and dark but also a solid shooter." -- Also the developer

"Have you seen the film Fantastic Voyage? Or Inner Space? No? Yeah, well, I love those too." -- Still the developer

We do original research into the history of games to make interesting projects. Cell Sword is our love letter to the #6DoF subgenre.

Please note: Screenshots and trailer footage are taken from the development version and the final product will look different.

Trailer music is "Spider Pants (with Grace)" by WangleLine.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 equiavlent or later
  • Processor: A decent CPU from the last 5 years
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: A decent GPU from the last 5 years
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 equiavlent or later
  • Processor: A decent CPU from the last 3 years
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: A decent GPU from the last 3 years
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS X 10.13
  • Processor: A decent Intel Core or Apple M series CPU from the last 5 years
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: A decent GPU from the last 5 years
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS X 10.15
  • Processor: A decent Intel Core or Apple M series CPU from the last 3 years
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: A decent GPU from the last 3 years
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Your medical emergency is important to us. Our health professionals will be inside you shortly. Cell Sword is an action-packed six-degrees-of-freedom sci-fi shooter set inside the human body.
